doc:
Danny O'Dea https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Danny_O%27Dea 0 Danny O'Dea (22 December 1911 – 16 April 2003) was an English actor. He made numerous appearances as Eli Duckett in the British sitcom Last of the Summer Wine between 1986 and 2002. His film roles include Paddie, an elderly man in Rita, Sue and Bob Too in 1986. His stage work included two pantomimes at the Swansea Grand Theatre in Wales: Robin Hood and Puss in Boots.He died in Hartshead, Yorkshire. Danny_O'Dea ( 22_December_1911 – 16_April_2003 ) was an_English_actor . He made numerous_appearances as Eli_Duckett in the_British_sitcom Last of the_Summer_Wine between 1986_and_2002 . His_film_roles include Paddie , an_elderly_man in Rita , Sue and Bob_Too in 1986 . His_stage_work included two_pantomimes at the_Swansea_Grand_Theatre in Wales : Robin_Hood and Puss in Boots.He died in Hartshead , Yorkshire .
